definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: very dub.; only in [[לָדַעַת לָעוּת]] [[אֶת־יׇעֵף דָּבָר]] Is 50:4 usu. to help, so Ges Del Di Ry:Kau al., but in that case an Aramaism (Aram. …[[עות ]] = Ar. ga03a, q. v. sub [[עוּשׁ]]); text prob. corrupt, LXX Oort:Th T 1891, 469 [[לְעִתּוֹ]], and del. [[אֶת־יׇעֵף]]; Klo Che:Comm. [[לִרְעוֹת]] ‘ teach, edify, ’ Gr [[לַעֲנוֹת]], Che:Hpt. [[לְהַחֲיוֹת]].
